title: Smoke Thoughts, Karen, Vaccination, Voting and more.
itunes:title: Smoke Thoughts, Karen, Vaccination, Voting and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Friday and never mad. The CLO has recommended that a woman go to the J Spot to get a real opinion. The Free Britney Spears movement is on!!! We get smoke thoughts from Fool #2 with that Dre beat underneath. COVID is effectively affecting sports because people are testing positive! We need you to turn up the heat and protect your right to vote. Call your senator! 888-453-3211. The Delta Variant of COVID-19 is tearing through the country. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve makes it clear that courage is necessary to win!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
